name: Jurassic Extinction
description:
Jurassic Extinction is an FPS/simulation, where you'll encounter over 20 specie's of dinosaur's (including Juvenile's) that are designed to be scientificly acurate, and kill them as well.
  • Advanced AI: aggro, detection radius, run attack's, warning's, etc. Some dino's will hide, others are eating a kill, some sleeping, and some give you a warning that your "too close".
  • All ammo and weapon's are found on item crate's, found at the entrance to all area's.
  • At the end of every level is a teleport to the next.
  • There is no pause menu, as realisticly, life doesnt pause. It's an exit menu.
  • Theres 8 level's, and an end level. Certain levels have different setting's (night, day, bright sun, rain, etc.).
Jurassic Extinction is in 4k, and built with high end GFX support (post processing effect's/camera effect's), and is highly performant.
